entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023
